channel.title: About Food from the Prue Leith Culinary Institute
channel.managingEditor: about-food@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Adele Stiehler-vd Westhuizen | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)

channel.description:
After 20 years at the forefront of professional culinary training, the Prue Leith Chefs Academy has invested R10.5 million in new kitchen and lecture facilities, confirming its place at the leading edge of culinary tuition in South Africa and Africa.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Adele Stiehler-vd Westhuizen | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
item.title: Talking food, health and hospitality | Prue Leith CBE (Prue Leith Culinary Institute | Patron)
item.itunes:title: Talking food, health and hospitality | Prue Leith CBE (Prue Leith Culinary Institute | Patron)
item.itunes:subtitle: As she turns 80, Prue shares her lifetime in food, media and hospitality
item.description:
In this episode Prue Leith, CBE, the patron of the Prue Leith Culinary Institute in South Africa, talks to Adele Stiehler-van der Westhuizen shortly before her 80th birthday. Prue shares fond memories as she looks back at a lifetime in food, media and hospitality and gives some advice to those who consider a career in food. The conversation starts with Prue's looking back at some of her fondest moments including some of her biggest cooking blunders, but extends to serious conversations about sustainability, the future of food, meat consumption, healthy eating and her latest book, The Vegetarian Kitchen.


Learn more about Prue Leith, CBE, on her website https://prue-leith.com/

Music : Music by Stephan Gericke


Visit the Prue Leith Culinary Institute website where you'll find links to professional chef training, short courses, consulting, recipes and food articles. https://www.prueleith.co.za/

Follow on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/prueleith/

Follow on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/prueleithchefs/


When you're ready to produce your own podcast, contact the podcast experts at SolidGoldStudios.co.za
item.content:encoded:
In this episode Prue Leith, CBE, the patron of the Prue Leith Culinary Institute in South Africa, talks to Adele Stiehler-van der Westhuizen shortly before her 80th birthday. Prue shares fond memories as she looks back at a lifetime in food, media and hospitality and gives some advice to those who consider a career in food. The conversation starts with Prue's looking back at some of her fondest moments including some of her biggest cooking blunders, but extends to serious conversations about sustainability, the future of food, meat consumption, healthy eating and her latest book, The Vegetarian Kitchen.


Learn more about Prue Leith, CBE, on her website https://prue-leith.com/

Music : Music by Stephan Gericke


Visit the Prue Leith Culinary Institute website where you'll find links to professional chef training, short courses, consulting, recipes and food articles. https://www.prueleith.co.za/
